titles.title: Renovate and Enhance Veterans Meeting Halls and Posts Act of 2017
Renovate and Enhance Veterans Meeting Halls and Posts Act of 2017
REVAMP Act of 2017
REVAMP Act of 2017

To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a pilot program to provide grants to veterans service organizations for upgrading local chapter facilities, including technology at such facilities, in rural areas, and for other purposes.
REVAMP Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
